# jts

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/ITSLeeds/jts/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ITSLeeds/jts/actions)

The goal of jts is to provide easy access to the DfT's Journey Time Statistics.
